viaflow.name: ViaFlow
viaflow.description: Connect to any Minecraft server version using ViaVersion protocol translation
viaflow.settings.enabled.name: Enable ViaFlow
viaflow.settings.enabled.description: Enable or disable ViaFlow protocol translation
viaflow.settings.protocol.name: Protocol Settings
viaflow.settings.targetVersion.name: Target Version
viaflow.settings.targetVersion.descripti: The server version to connect as. Use Auto Detect to automatically match server version.
viaflow.settings.showVersionInF3.name: Show Version in F3
viaflow.settings.showVersionInF3.descrip: Display protocol version information in the F3 debug screen
viaflow.settings.showVersionInTabList.de: Display the target version in the player tab list
viaflow.settings.advanced.name: Advanced Settings
viaflow.settings.verifySessionInOldVersi: Verify session when connecting to servers older than 1.7
viaflow.settings.allowBetaCraftAuth.name: BetaCraft Authentication
viaflow.settings.allowBetaCraftAuth.desc: Allow BetaCraft MP-Pass authentication for classic servers
